featured.text: Everyone dreams about 20 percent of their sleeping time.
24 these “non-dreamers” do their sleeping in a laboratory 25 researchers can wake them up and ask them whether they were having dreams the moment before, it 26 that they dream as much as others.

definition.zh_def: 睡眠；一種自然的生理狀態，通常伴隨著意識的喪失和身體的放鬆。
definition.en_def: The state of rest in which the body is inactive and the mind is unconscious.
definition.example: After a long day at work, I look forward to sleeping early.
